about_the_game:
This is the third and final puzzle box in this year's Christmas 2020 event. The illustration is by Betty Elgyn and is named Mystery Town. For the countries, where snow is slow to come this year, it will certainly put you in the right mood for the holidays.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Christmas Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in UHD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. This puzzle should prove to be an interesting one, maintaining very similar tones across the entire scene. There are distinct details, however, so it should give you several anchors to start building.
detailed_description:
This is the third and final puzzle box in this year's Christmas 2020 event. The illustration is by Betty Elgyn and is named Mystery Town. For the countries, where snow is slow to come this year, it will certainly put you in the right mood for the holidays.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Christmas Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in UHD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. This puzzle should prove to be an interesting one, maintaining very similar tones across the entire scene. There are distinct details, however, so it should give you several anchors to start building.

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 720p Capable Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
